00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_RANGE_CHAIN_TRAITS_ITERATOR_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_RANGE_CHAIN_TRAITS_ITERATOR_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_reference.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_traits.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/range/detail/chain_iterator.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/range/detail/demote_iterator_traversal_tag.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/type_traits/meta_convert.hpp>
00018 
00019 namespace boost{
00020 namespace assign{
00021 namespace v2{
00022 namespace chain_traits{
00023 
00024         template<
00025         typename It1, 
00026         typename It2,
00027         typename Tag
00028     >
00029         struct iterator
00030         {
00031         typedef typename boost::iterator_reference<It1>::type ref1_;
00032         typedef typename boost::iterator_reference<It2>::type ref2_;
00033 
00034         typedef assign::v2::type_traits::meta_convert<Tag> convert_;
00035         typedef typename boost::mpl::apply2<
00036             convert_,
00037             ref1_,
00038             ref2_
00039         >::type reference;
00040         
00041         typedef typename boost::remove_reference<reference>::type value_type;
00042     
00043         typedef boost::range_detail::chain_iterator<
00044                 It1,
00045                 It2,
00046                 value_type,     
00047                 reference,
00048                         // TODO should be able to use default 
00049             // problems arise because traits are probably not defined for 
00050             // complicated ranges
00051             boost::single_pass_traversal_tag  
00052         > type;
00053 
00054         };
00055 
00056 }// chain_traits
00057 }// v2
00058 }// assign
00059 }// boost
00060 
00061 #endif
